DOC.brief_summary: This study is a test of cognitive behavioral therapy(CBT) and behavioral weight loss (BWL) treatments for obese patients with binge eating disorder (BED). The study involves a comparison of three treatment conditions: (1) CBT; (2) BWL, and (3) a sequential (two-part) treatment consisting of CBT followed by BWL.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment for Obesity and Binge Eating Disorder
DOC.criteria: Binge Eating Overweight Pregnancy Current cardiac disease Serious neurologic illnesses
